page.title: 05BUILTH (W) : RECREATION
page.content: FACILITIES There is a wide range of recreational facilities avalible in this small market town.The most popular place for children is a playing field alongside the river Wye,called the Groe.Here there are swings,roundabouts and slides;there is also a rugby pitch during the winter. The tennis courts are very popular during the summer and are used by the high school,town tennis club and the public.The open air swimming pool has recently been opened,it is very popular when the weather is hot. Hopefully the pool will be covered over in future. The Sports Hall was opened in 1980.It is used by the high school in the day and by the public in the evenings. Activities include squash,badminton, netball and table-tennis.
